body:
Just learned in HDF5 User's Group that upcomming releases will utilize a [BSD-2 Clause licensed](https://gitlab.dkrz.de/k202009/libaec/-/blob/master/Copyright.txt) version of [szip](https://gitlab.dkrz.de/k202009/libaec).

The BSD licensing of this version IMHO makes it more attractive for spack. 

The [existing version](https://support.hdfgroup.org/doc_resource/SZIP/) Spack builds supports only non-commercial use.
title: Recommend switch in szip package
